constructor.details: Initialize the contract with fee recipient

params._feeRecipient: Address that will receive protocol fees

returns.requestId: Unique identifier for the payment request

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payRequest(string,address,address,uint25.details: The payment request data is stored on IPFS and referenced by CID

params.amount: Total amount to pay (fee will be deducted from this)
params.ipfsCID: IPFS content identifier containing payment request details
params.recipient: Address that should receive the payment

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFee(uint256).details: Only owner can call this function

setFeeRecipient(address).details: Only owner can call this function

params.newFeeRecipient: New address to receive protocol fees

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

FEE_DENOMINATOR().notice: Denominator for fee calculations (10,000 basis points = 100%)

MAX_FEE().notice: Maximum fee that can be set (10%)

calculateFee(uint256).notice: Calculate fee amount for a given payment amount

generateRequestId(string).notice: Generate request ID from IPFS CID

payRequest(string,address,address,uint25.notice: Process payment for a payment request stored on IPFS
